billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Relates to the powers of the Monroe county water authority
summary: Relates to the powers of the Monroe county water authority; allows the Monroe county water authority to purchase, lease, develop or construct upon property acquired in other areas without having to obtain prior permission from the municipality where the property is located.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the powers of the Monroe county water authority
